Content.Name: What Is It Like?
Content.Title: What Is It Like?
Content.BodyCopy:
Speaking Partners have said:

“Being a Speaking Partner has helped me to improve in many things in my life, such as to strive to be more prepared, to develop willingness to help others, to be more patient, to learn about real sacrifice, teaching skills, and above all: love.”
—Anonymous

“I really enjoyed working with my partner. He was very easy to talk and relate to, and it felt like we became friends right from the start. I really see him as a friend and plan on keeping in contact with him in the future.”
—Anonymous

“This is such an exciting time for technology because of the services that can be offered to more people. The Speaking Partner program was such a wonderful experience for me because I was able to become a better teacher through it and help someone improve in [their] life.”
—Tiffanie Meza

“I have loved feeling like a helper to a lovely, hardworking, conscientious student. I absolutely loved the spiritual nature of the assignments. It was a strength to my testimony to hear her bear her strong testimony!”
—Anonymous

“I think everybody should take part in this… The ability to speak two languages fluently has been a really big blessing in my life, and I will do anything in my power to see that many others have this opportunity.”
—Anonymous

“I think that the Pathway program is a very beneficial program … To be able to further their education can bring many blessings to ‘the one’ and will help them be able to fulfill the commandments that have been given to continue throughout our lives.”
—Kira Good

Pathway Students have said:

“I feel very grateful and blessed for this program. I have learned a lot of things. My testimony is stronger and I know that the Lord hears my prayers because He inspired our leaders to implement this program that is the answer of many prayers.”
—Brenda Morales

“… The factor that really has made a difference in my English is having a Speaking Partner. In only a few months, I can notice how my English skills had increased in a marvelous way… Now I feel more confident using my English knowledge. Yes, having a Speaking Partner is a beneficial experience. They are really good people. I have no doubt that the BYU-I Pathway Program, including Speaking Partners, was and is inspired by the Lord.”
–Enrique Ramirez

“I also want to thank for being aware for all the things that we could not even achieve ourselves in that hard moments, but most especially for our Speaking Partners. I learned so much from them, they were with us, helping us and teaching us.”
—David Limon

“It’s just great how I can learn from someone that is miles away but still on the same path towards happiness.”
—Anonymous

“I am building my future with your help. I know that this is only the beginning.”
—Israel Limon

“The Speaking Partner program is a great opportunity to make new friends, to really get to know a new language, and a new culture. I love to learn English by this program. Your Speaking Partners really care about your learning and help you to improve in many other aspects.”
—Ayami Martinez
